info.description: This is the API documentation for Livotech Warehouse Management System API Documentation
info.title: Livotech Warehouse Management System API Documentation

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token with optional refresh token
Logout user and invalidate current session or all sessions

parameters.description: Optional refresh token to logout specific session
parameters.name: request

post.description: Generate a new access token using a valid refresh token
Create a new user account with username, password, full name, and email

get.description: Retrieve a list of boxes with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search term for box code or name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a single box by ID

put.description: Update an existing box by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of channels with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search term for channel code or name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a single channel by ID

put.description: Update an existing channel by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of expeditions with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search term for expedition code or name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a single expedition by ID

put.description: Update an existing expedition by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of orders with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search term for order ginee id or tracking number
parameters.name: search

post.description: Assign a picker to an order

get.description: Retrieve orders assigned to a all picker with pagination, date range filtering, and search

post.description: Create multiple orders in a single request

get.description: Retrieve a single order by ID

put.description: Mark an order as pending picking
Update the picking completed status of an order
Update the QC process status of an order

get.description: Retrieve a list of products with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search term for product SKU or name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a single product by ID

put.description: Update an existing product by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of QC Onlines with pagination and search

parameters.description: Number of QC Onlines per page
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Retrieve a single QC Online by ID
Retrieve a list of QC Ribbons with pagination and search

parameters.description: Number of QC Ribbons per page
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Retrieve a single QC Ribbon by ID
Retrieve a list of roles with pagination and search
Retrieve a single role by ID

put.description: Update an existing role by ID

get.description: Retrieve a list of stores with pagination and search

parameters.description: Search term for store code or name
parameters.name: search

get.description: Retrieve a single store by ID

put.description: Update an existing store by ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users with optional search and role filtering

parameters.description: Search term for username or full name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new user with optional role assignment

get.description: Retrieve a single user by ID

delete.description: Delete a user by ID and all associated sessions

post.description: Assign a role to a user

delete.description: Remove a role from a user

get.description: Retrieve all active sessions for a user
